subject: Soccer
Weather
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Costa Rica is asking soccer’s governing body for a replay of Friday’s World Cup qualifier against the United States, won, 1-0, by the Americans during a snowstorm.
snippet: Costa Rica is asking soccer’s governing body for a replay of Friday’s World Cup qualifier against the United States, won, 1-0, by the Americans during a snowstorm.
